1.0.name: wordpress/slidely-slideshows-embed
1.0.description:
Create and share on your blog amazing Slideshow from any photos you have and add music in less then 5 Minutes. With the new Slidely embed shortcode plugin you can finally share your favorite Slidely slideshows with your blog readers.

Slidely Features

  • Easy to use
  • Use any photo you want: Facebook, Instagram, Google Images, Flicker, Picasa or Upload from your computer
  • Use any music you want: YouTube, Soundcloud or upload your own (you can pick from different genres)
  • Custom themes
  • Many sharing options: Facebook, Twitter, Google Plus, Pinterest, Email and Embed (i.e plugin)

How to create a slideshow?

  1. Go to slide.ly
  2. Click on create now and connect using you Facebook account or other credentials
  3. Create a slideshow in 3 simple steps
  4. Copy your link url and use it in the Slidely plugin
